      • getConnectiontype

        java.lang.String getConnectiontype()
        Returns the value of the 'Connectiontype' attribute. The literals are from the enumeration deviceapi.ConectionType.

        If the meaning of the 'Connectiontype' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...
